msg.msgText: A cluster store ownership conflict has occurred.

msgExplanation.p: The cluster component of Message Gateway is trying to recover from a store that was created by a different cluster member than the local server. This may be caused by recovering from a store backup produced by one cluster member and a configuration backup produced by another cluster member.

msgUserResponse.p: Ensure that the server is recovering from the correct and consistent store and configuration backup combination. If the problem persists, contact IBM Support.
